Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Class Controller is assigned to a VirtualView and to a Model (GAME), it helps the server in performing the actions needed to play a Santorini Game.
See Also:

    • turns

      public void turns() throws WorkerNotExistException, InvalidInputException, java.net.SocketTimeoutException
      Method used to perform the turns alternation between players
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - is never thrown because the player must belong to the game
      WorkerNotExistException - if the worker doesn't belong to the game (Already checked when accepting the client's input)
      java.net.SocketTimeoutException

    • setActive

      public void setActive​(java.lang.String ID) throws java.net.SocketTimeoutException
      Method used to communicate that a player is active, and all others are inactive
      Parameters:
      ID - is the username that is active
      Throws:
      java.net.SocketTimeoutException
